page.title: 07AMENITIES
page.content: There are very few amenities and services in the area. However one amenity which crops up TWICE in this block, but which DOES NOT fit into any category in the amenity list, is a Village Hall! There is one in square 2 and one in square 11. These village halls are used as meeting places for any club or organisation that wishes to hire them; for parish and Parish Council meetings, for dances, discos, wedding receptions and any other events taking place in the parish! The bus services counted passing through Hinderclay as 2, are 2 services per week, one to Diss and one to Bury St. Edmunds, on each town's respective Market Day. With such restricted public transport, most families have their own transport in the form of a car.
